Microsoft Azure Developer Certification Associate AZ-204 Course

Microsoft Azure Developer Certification

Associate AZ-204 Course

About This Course

To assist you in getting ready for the AZ-204 Developing Solutions for Microsoft Azure test, this learning path

has been created. These courses will provide you a thorough grasp of creating applications on Azure, even if

you don’t intend to take the exam. The Microsoft Certified Azure Developer Associate certification is awarded

to applicants who successfully complete the AZ-204 exam.

Module 1: Managing Azure subscription and resources
Module 2: Implementing and managing storage
Module 3: Deploying and managing Virtual Machines
Module 4: Configuring and managing Virtual Networks
Module 5: Developing Azure IaaS Solutions
Module 6: Developing Azure PaaS Solutions
Module 7: Developing for Azure Storage
Module 8: Implementing Azure security
Module 9: Monitor, troubleshoot and optimize Azure solutions
Module 10: Connecting and consuming Azure and third-party services
